description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Twist Imperfect is a fast-paced puzzle game in which you must match falling characters.  Match two power-orbs and you’ll release a fortune cat, increasing your score multiplier. The more cats released the bigger the multiplier!  Twist Imperfect also features a split-screen, simultaneous two-player mode.
description.short: Twist Imperfect is a fast-paced puzzle game in which you must match falling characters.  Match two power-orbs and you’ll release a fortune cat, increasing your score multiplier. The more cats released the bigger the multiplier!  Twist Imperfect also features a split-screen, simultaneous two-player mode.
